languages.text: "Слабый, никчемный идиот, я столько лет взращивал в тебе эту ярость, а ты все противишься! Решил в последний момент отказаться от благословения Бога Черепов? Что ж... Он заберет всех вас в любом случае". {n}Плоть Вортена лопается, и последнее, что вы успеваете заметить — лишь яростный взгляд, обращенный прямо на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Слабый, никчемный идиот, я столько лет взращивал в тебе эту ярость, а ты все противишься! Решил в последний момент отказаться от благословения Бога Черепов? Что ж... Он заберет всех вас в любом случае". {n}Плоть вортена лопается, и последнее, что вы успеваете заметить — лишь яросный взглят, обращенный прямо на вас.{/n}

languages.text: "Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Слабый, никчемный идиот, я столько лет взращивал в тебе эту ярость, а ты все противишься! Решил в последний момент отказаться от благословения Бога Черепов? Что ж... Он заберет всех вас в любом случае". {n}Плоть Вортена лопается, и последнее, что вы успеваете заметить — лишь яростный взгляд, обращенный прямо на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "A weak, useless fool! I had spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and now you are revolting! Decided to refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? "Well... he will take everyone of you either way." {n}Worten's flesh bursts and the last thing you could notice — his hateful gaze, directly trained on you.{/n}

"A weak, useless fool! I had spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and now you are revolting! Decided to refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? "Well... he will take everyone of you either way." {n}Worten's flesh bursts and the last thing you could notice — his hateful gaze, directly trained on you.{/n}

"Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

"A weak, useless fool! I had spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and now you are revolting! Decided to refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? "Well... he will take every one of you either way." {n}Worten's flesh bursts and the last thing you could notice is his hateful gaze, directly trained on you.{/n}

"Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

"Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

"Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Patético y débil necio! Con la de años que he pasado cultivando esa furia en tu interior, ¡y todavía te resistes! ¿Creías que podrías renegar de la bendición del Dios de los Cráneos en el último momento? Tanto da... de un modo u otro, se adueñará de vosotros». {n}La envoltura de carne de Worten revienta, y lo último que ves es su mirada de odio, clavada directamente en ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Patético y débil necio! Con la de años que he pasado cultivando esa furia en tu interior, ¡y ahora te rebelas! ¿Reniegas de la bendición del Dios de los Cráneos en el último momento? Tanto da... de un modo u otro, se cobrará las vidas de todos vosotros». {n}La envoltura de carne de Worten revienta, y lo último que alcanzaste a ver fue su mirada de odio clavada directamente en ti.{/n}

languages.text: “软弱无用的蠢货！我花了这么多年的时间培养你心中的怒火，可你却仍然不肯乖乖就范！你真的以为，你能在最后一刻拒绝颅骨之神的祝福吗？好吧……无论怎么样，他都会把你们每个人都杀光。”{n}沃尔腾的肉体爆裂开来。你注意到的最后一件事情，是他充满恨意的目光转向了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “软弱无用的蠢货！我花了这么多年的时间，培养你心中的愤怒，可你现在竟敢反抗！你竟敢在最后一刻，拒绝颅骨之神的祝福？好吧……无论怎样，他都会把你们每个人都杀光。”{n}沃尔腾的肉体爆裂开来。你注意到的最后一件事情，是他仇恨的目光直直地对准了你。{/n}

languages.text: « Misérable imbécile ! J'ai passé tant d'années à attiser cette rage en vous et pourtant, vous persistez à résister ? Pensiez-vous pouvoir refuser la bénédiction du Dieu des Crânes au tout dernier moment ? Peu importe... Il vous prendra tous, quoi qu'il advienne. » {n}Soudain, le corps de Worten explose. La dernière chose que vous remarquez est le regard rempli de haine qu'il fixe sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Misérable imbécile ! J'ai passé tant d'années à attiser cette rage en vous et pourtant, vous persistez à résister ? Pensiez-vous pouvoir refuser la bénédiction du Dieu des Crânes au tout dernier moment ? Peu importe... Il vous prendra tous, quoi qu'il advienne. » {n}Soudain, le corps de Worten explose. La dernière chose que vous remarquez est le regard rempli de haine qu'il fixe sur vous.{/n}

languages.text: 「弱くて役立たずの愚か者め！俺は長い年月をかけてお前の中にこの怒りを育ててきたというのに、それでもお前は抵抗するというのか！最後の瞬間に髑髏の神の祝福を拒むというのか？まあ…いずれにせよ、主はお前たち一人残らず連れて行くだろう」{n}ヴォルテンの肉体が破裂する。あなたが最後に気づいたのは、あなたに向けられた憎悪のまなざしだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「弱くて役立たずの愚か者め！俺は長い年月をかけてお前の中にこの怒りを育ててきたというのに、今お前は反乱を起こしている！最後の瞬間に髑髏の神の祝福を拒むというのか？」「まあ…いずれにせよ、主はお前たち一人残らず連れて行くだろう」{n}ヴォルテンの肉体が破裂する。あなたが最後に気づいたのは、あなたに向けられた憎悪のまなざしだった。{/n}

languages.text: "Schwacher, wertloser Narr! Ich habe so viele Jahre damit zugebracht, diese Wut in Euch zu nähren, und immer noch widersetzt Ihr Euch! Dachtet Ihr, dass Ihr Euch dem Segen des Schädelgottes in letzter Sekunde verweigern könnt? Tja ... so oder so. Er wird Euch alle holen." {n}Wortens Fleisch platzt auf, und das Letzte, was du bemerkst, ist sein hasserfüllter Blick, der sich dir zuwendet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Weak, worthless fool! I have spent so many years growing this rage inside you, and still you resist! Did you think you could refuse the blessing of the Skull God at the last moment? Well... one way or another, he will claim you all." {n}Worten's flesh bursts, and the last thing you notice is his hateful gaze turning to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein schwacher, nutzloser Narr! Ich habe so viele Jahre damit zugebracht, diese Wut in Euch heranzuzüchten, und nun revoltiert Ihr! Ihr entscheidet im letzten Augenblick, den Segen des Schädelgottes abzulehnen? "Nun ... er wird Euch dennoch alle holen." {n}Wortens Fleisch platzt auf, und das Letzte, was du bemerkst, ist sein hasserfüllter Blick, der direkt auf dich gerichtet ist.{/n}
